ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Shadow Cat and Snow Tech ran out of the Ark and found themselves right in the center of battle, enemies and comrades all about them fighting to save their own

Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
From: "A.J. Gould" <black_panther_kitten@...>

Shadow Cat and Snow Tech ran out of the Ark and found
themselves right in the center of battle, enemies and
comrades all about them fighting to save their own
sparks.
Snow Tech gulped as he saw how the Predacons seemed to
have the Maximals on the run but a determined look
from his sister make him swallow his fear, taking out
his electric gun from his back compartment he took one
last deep breath and then headed out into the
battle...shooting at the first enemy that came into
sight, Anubis!
His lightning gun blared in a britience of light
before a massive force of electric energy erupted from
the berrle and headed straight for the Predacon enemy.
The force and shear power of the gun giving enough
force to rip any bot to shreds!
Yelling as his finger pressed the trigger...

" Die, Predacon scum!!"

Shadow Cat shook her head at her brother's antics but
also saw how beaten the Maximal forces were, they
needed help and as little help as her brother and
herself were they were still there and ready to kick
some Predacon a$$!
Shadow Cat armed her wrist cannon with it's virus
tipped darts within and aimed towards Unitron, with a
wicked and cruel smile on her face she fired the darts
at his chest-plate. The darts carried a very heavy
virus on their tips that would drop the most skilled
of bots in nano-clicks, the virus eating away at their
internal circuits and leaving nothing more then
liquid.
